Class: RGColor

RGColor(r, g, b, a)

A color value.

Constructor

new RGColor(r, g, b, a)

Creates a color object that can store RGBA values. RGBA input should be in range [0,1]
Parameters:
Name Type Description
r Number The red component of this color.
g Number The green component of this color.
b Number The blue component of this color.
a Number The alpha component of this color.

getRgba255

Returns an Rgba255Color object with values mapping to the range [0,255]
